attributes.action: Introduce policy making by the public via the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we all know, many new policies and laws that are introduced by elected governments only really go to serve big business/lawyers/ and political parties for there own ends.

My idea for true democracy in this country is to phase-in a policy making website, whereby the public can forward ideas and policies on thousand of different subjects under different headings ranging from Government Administrative Appointments to Economics, Law, NHS, Immigration, Schools etc.

The introduction of ideas gets limited to the best ten proposals under each subject as decided by a parlimentary committee made up from a jury serving public only, which then gets forwarded to the online voting system.

The three best ideas get turned into drafted policies by the same public jury for that one proposal, then the public votes until there is one winning proposal which is passed as law or legislation for a trial period of one year, whereby after this period it becomes legislation/law.
